page.title: 13 Mobile Homes
page.content:
The Mobile Homes are situated off Flexford Road. There are 50 homes on the site which is owned by the Test Valley Council. Owners pay rent to them for the use of the amenities.
Each home has its own garden, number and road name. No children or pets are allowed. Residents are elderly, mostly retired couples.
The mobile homes last only for about 13 years before they begin to disintergrate.
There are at least 2 fire points on the site.
The site was well cared for with many flowers and well tended gardens. Many gardens had colourful garden gnomes.
